snippet: The Yankees were hit with a $28 million luxury-tax bill, pushing their total past $250 million since the penalty began in 2003.
abstract: New York Yankees receive $28 million luxury-tax bill, pushing their total past $250 million since the penalty began in 2003.
lead_paragraph: The Yankees were hit with a $28 million luxury-tax bill, pushing their total past $250 million since the penalty began in 2003.

headline.main: Yankees Must Pay $28 Million Luxury-Tax Penalty
